org.jtrim2.taskgraph

Class TaskFactoryProperties.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jtrim2.taskgraph.TaskFactoryProperties.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    TaskFactoryProperties

    public static class TaskFactoryProperties.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    The Builder used to create TaskFactoryProperties instances.

    Thread safety

    The methods of this class may not be used from multiple threads concurrently.

    Synchronization transparency

    The methods of this class are synchronization transparent.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Builder()
      Initializes the Builder with the default values: factoryExecutor: An executor synchronously executing tasks on the calling thread.
      Builder(TaskFactoryProperties defaults)
      Initializes the Builder with the values of the given TaskFactoryProperties.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TaskFactoryProperties build()
      Creates a snapshot of the current state of this Builder.
      TaskNodeProperties.Builder defaultNodeProperties()
      Returns the default values of the properties used by the task nodes.
      void setFactoryExecutor(TaskExecutor factoryExecutor)
      Sets the executor used execute the createTaskNode method of the associated task factory.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Builder

        public Builder()
        Initializes the Builder with the default values:
        • factoryExecutor: An executor synchronously executing tasks on the calling thread.

      • Builder

        public Builder(TaskFactoryProperties defaults)
        Initializes the Builder with the values of the given TaskFactoryProperties. Immediately creating a TaskFactoryProperties from this Builder will yield an effectively equivalent TaskFactoryProperties as the argument.
        Parameters:
        defaults - the default values used to initialize the Builder. This argument cannot be null.

    • Method Detail

      • defaultNodeProperties

        public TaskNodeProperties.Builder defaultNodeProperties()
        Returns the default values of the properties used by the task nodes. These values might be adjusted by the caller. However, they must be adjusted before calling build().

        Subclasses may override this method to further specify the return type.

        Returns:
        the default values of the properties used by the task nodes. This method never returns null.

      • setFactoryExecutor

        public final void setFactoryExecutor(TaskExecutor factoryExecutor)
        Sets the executor used execute the createTaskNode method of the associated task factory. Setting the executor will override any previously set value.
        Parameters:
        factoryExecutor - the executor used execute the createTaskNode method of the associated task factory. This argument cannot be null.

      • build

        public TaskFactoryProperties build()
        Creates a snapshot of the current state of this Builder. Further adjustment of this Builder will not affect the returned TaskFactoryProperties.
        Returns:
        a snapshot of the current state of this Builder. This method may never return null.
